snippet: Wells Fargo, China Development Bank and the Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group of Japan are in a three-way race to acquire RBS Aviation Capital.
abstract: Wells Fargo, China Development Bank and the Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group of Japan are in a three-way race to acquire RBS Aviation Capital.

headline.main: 3 Buyers Vie for R.B.S. Aircraft Leasing Unit
